mapper.select: SELECT B.HASH_NO , B.HASH_TYPE , B.HASH_NAME FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_HASHTAG A ON(P.PRODUCT_NO = A.PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN HASHTAG B ON(A.HASH_NO = B.HASH_NO) WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{ id }

SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_KNAME , PRODUCT_ENAME , SALE_PRICE , PRODUCT_COUNT , WINERY , THUMBNAIL , CAPACITY , ABV , TASTE_GRAPH , INFORMATION , AWARD , TIP , LABEL_IMAGE , STATUS , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , VARIETY_NO , TYPE_NO , COUNTRY_NO FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.PRODUCT_KNAME , P.PRODUCT_ENAME , P.SALE_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_COUNT , P.WINERY , P.THUMBNAIL , P.CAPACITY , P.ABV , P.TASTE_GRAPH , P.INFORMATION , P.AWARD , P.TIP , P.LABEL_IMAGE , P.STATUS , P.CREATE_DATE , P.MODIFY_DATE , P.VARIETY_NO , P.TYPE_NO , P.COUNTRY_NO , C.COUNTRY_NAME , D.TYPE_NAME , E.VARIETY_NAME , B.HASH_NO , B.HASH_TYPE , B.HASH_NAME FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_HASHTAG A ON(P.PRODUCT_NO = A.PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN HASHTAG B ON(A.HASH_NO = B.HASH_NO) LEFT JOIN COUNTRY C ON (P.COUNTRY_NO = C.COUNTRY_NO) LEFT JOIN TYPE D ON(P.TYPE_NO = D.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN VARIETY E ON(P.VARIETY_NO = E.VARIETY_NO) WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{ id }

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.PRODUCT_KNAME , P.PRODUCT_ENAME , P.SALE_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_COUNT , P.WINERY , P.THUMBNAIL , P.CAPACITY , P.ABV , P.TASTE_GRAPH , P.INFORMATION , P.AWARD , P.TIP , P.LABEL_IMAGE , P.STATUS , P.CREATE_DATE , P.MODIFY_DATE , P.VARIETY_NO , P.TYPE_NO , P.COUNTRY_NO FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN COUNTRY C ON (P.COUNTRY_NO = C.COUNTRY_NO) LEFT JOIN TYPE D ON(P.TYPE_NO = D.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN VARIETY E ON(P.VARIETY_NO = E.VARIETY_NO) WHERE 1=1
AND COUNTRY_NAME = #{ country }
AND TYPE_NAME = #{ type }
AND (UPPER(REPLACE(PRODUCT_KNAME,' ','')) LIKE REPLACE(UPPER('%' || #{name} || '%'),' ','') OR UPPER(REPLACE(PRODUCT_ENAME,' ','')) LIKE REPLACE(UPPER('%' || #{name} || '%'),' ',''))
AND VARIETY_NAME = #{ variety }
AND SALE_PRICE <= 10000
AND SALE_PRICE BETWEEN 10000 AND 30000
AND SALE_PRICE BETWEEN 30000 AND 50000
AND SALE_PRICE BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000
AND SALE_PRICE BETWEEN 100000 AND 200000
AND SALE_PRICE BETWEEN 200000 AND 300000

SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_KNAME , PRODUCT_ENAME , SALE_PRICE , PRODUCT_COUNT , WINERY , THUMBNAIL , CAPACITY , ABV , TASTE_GRAPH , INFORMATION , AWARD , TIP , LABEL_IMAGE , STATUS , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , VARIETY_NO , TYPE_NO , COUNTRY_NO FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY SALE_PRICE
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
